snippet.title: LIT™ (By WayForward) - iOS / Android - Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
WayForward’s classic horror-puzzle game LIT is back, completely reimagined!
Take control of mopey teenager Jake as he delves into a living nightmare in search of his girlfriend Rachael. Use the available light sources to carve a path through the darkness – but watch your step! One wrong move could mean disaster!

• 16 original puzzles
• Par times for speed and efficiency
• Use matches, light bulbs, TVs, and more!

Can you survive the HORROR and see the light of day?!

App Store - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lit/id1046684819?mt=8

Play store - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wayforward.lit

Explore PLAYLIST - http://bit.ly/PuzzleGamesPlaylist

For regular updates on iPhone, Android Game, iPad, iPod Game Reviews, News, Previews, Trailers, Game Play Videos &
Walkthroughs, please subscribe us - https://goo.gl/8xye0U
